name: Block Balance
description:
Block Balance is our newest puzzle type game in which you have to build up a stack using all the given pieces and most important, you have to keep them in balance. Build the towers as high as you can and make sure they don't fall. Complete all the levels and show us you're a born engineer!

Easy to learn, hard to master! Over 15 exciting levels.. and more to come each week!

Give us your feedback and help us improve the game at: gamesbytimmy@gmail.com. We will work on new levels, new puzzles and new games for your smartphone!

This game was made with fonts from: http://www.dafont.com/baveuse.font

Music:Freesound.org:Bruno_ph-New theme 6.wav

Sounds:Freesound.org:zut50__yay.mp3,shades__crowd-ahh-1.wav,sonsdebarcelona__celebration.wav,stephsinger22__cheering.wav,cabeeno-rossley__shoot-laser.wav,_corsica-s__transport-2.wav
